title: Blind Pick - Role Priority Question
body:
Top/JG called.
3rd person hovers Cho'gath with Ignite (assuming Mid)
Quiet for 20s.
4th person calls mid and Locks in Syndra.

Who rightly gets mid?

replies.body: If you didn't claim it you aint gettin it.

Tricky issue tbh. 

I would probably assume Syndra, however we must question why the cho did not call a role. Maybe they have that stupid temp chat block? Maybe language barrier and have no idea what is going on. Generally a good idea for someone to ask of intentions.

The only time you can safely pick a role without calling is when everybody else has called and has selected champions (people change their minds). In all other cases, you must call to get the role (this includes those annoying 4man premades that don't call but have already decided their roles and instalock champs and leave the random confused and angry).
